attributes.action: stop constantly wasting tax payers money on stupid projects with no hope of success
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if it isnt broken dont fix it,not all problems can be fixed by throwing buckets loads of our money at it.Next time a goverment minister gets a "good" idea they are to be lead to a warm dark room given a cup of tea and asked do they really want to waste the already over taxed british peoples hard earned money on pointless waste of time such as the truancy farce and projects created just to keep new labour cronies in middle class employment,

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
